titleStmt.title: An elegie upon the truely lamented death of the Right Honorable Sir Julius Cæsar Knt. Master of the Rolles, and of Snt Katherins: and one of his Majesties most Honorable Privy Counsell. Wept by Fra: Qua
titleStmt.author: Quarles, Francis, 1592-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Miles Flesher] for Iohn Marriot,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
